content.raw:
Sure, we can check every cycle, but only broadcast from time to time. The thing is that the Finals plugin is relying on these messages, so that plugin will receive the information with a bit of delay and the completion time will also have some delay. 

We could try changing the architecture a bit, or just publish this at 1000Hz. What do you think is best?
content.html:
Sure, we can check every cycle, but only broadcast from time to time. The thing is that the Finals plugin is relying on these messages, so that plugin will receive the information with a bit of delay and the completion time will also have some delay.

We could try changing the architecture a bit, or just publish this at 1000Hz. What do you think is best?
